ComicInfo.Title: Meet the Manhunter!; The Wild One!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Meet the Manhunter!: Detective Murdock goes out West to become a bounty hunter and captures both Kid Colt and Rawhide Kid.
The Wild One!: Luke Randall is saved by a wild horse after he saves one of the other members of the herd.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
